column4: 32bit, it's the most compatible, and there is no good flash on 64bit
anybody know how to get X running from scratch ? I just don't know what packages I need to install
in fact.. the current workaround with ndiswrapper works pretty well..
!hardy | davek
that's funny
openbox isn't a DE
funny? it is?..  I don't think  I understand
you just said something about wireless cards to a question about X, anyway thanks Slart, you might want to take a break from helping these n00bs
haha, xserver doesn't pull in xorg ?
that's silly
what wouldn't a full X be ?
I'm trying to keep it as minimal as possible,
and I don't want a window manager if I can help it
no no no
I meant display manager
GDM, XDM, KDM, WDM etc
hmm.. I was commenting on your "there is no good flash on 64bit".. at the moment it uses ndiswrapper to run 32 bit flash on 64 bit firefox... and it's working pretty well
I thought ndiswrapper was a wireless thing exclusively...
huh
openbox doesn't pull in much
anyway, I JUST got it working
turns out I installed everything in the world BUT xorg
I thought so too.. until firefox installed it for me =)
